entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Temperature rising to minus 5 by morning.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind becoming south 20 km/h this evening. Temperature rising to minus 5 by morning. Wind chill minus 19 this evening and minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 30 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 16 February 2023
